about_the_game:
As one of the last warm bodies in Everreach-a land swarming with undead, you must gather resources, build shelters, and find allies to survive. Explore a world full of ruins and dungeons filled with secrets and treasures.

Rescue survivors, and they’ll join your cause, providing resources and unlocking new structures to expand your base. Equip yourself with an assortment of weapons and magic rings, find powerful tools, and uncover hidden blueprints to tip the odds in your favor. Explore dangerous landscapes, solve puzzles, avoid traps, and collect valuable treasures.

-Fantasy Survival: Gather resources to build and survive, explore many locations, and rescue survivors who will aid you on your journey. Explore dungeons filled with monsters, puzzles, traps, to recover various weapons and find rare rings, blueprints, tools, and of course - gold!

-Rogue-lite Gameplay: Confront hordes of undead, harvesting their heads to unlock permanent upgrades after death. Start each new run stronger than before, gradually working your way to Necrosarian himself! Play the game as designed--with permadeath enabled--or turn on 'easy mode' for a more relaxed gameplay experience.

-Upgrade and Customize: Choose from 3 unique classes, 15 weapons, 15 magical rings, and over 35 upgrades to customize your character's abilities. Adapt and overcome the challenges with a character suited to your strategy.

short_description: Fight through hordes undead, and collect their heads to unlock permanent upgrades while you gather resources to build your base. Choose your class, and preferred weapons. Explore dungeons to find rings, tools, and blueprints, and rescue NPCs who unlock new structures and provide various resources.
